metadata.Title: CVE-2021-28965 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
The REXML gem before 3.2.5 in Ruby before 2.6.7, 2.7.x before 2.7.3, and3.x before 3.0.1 does not properly address XML round-trip issues. Anincorrect document can be produced after parsing and serializing.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-28965` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libruby2.7 - 2.7.0-5ubuntu1.4
ruby2.7 - 2.7.0-5ubuntu1.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby2.7 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.7.0-5ubuntu1.4').
